message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. This gives you a decent share while ensuring I get a fair amount for starting the negotiations.
I think 60-40 is more reasonable, considering I'm taking the hit from inflation.
Bob, inflation is hitting you hard, and it's only going to get worse.  Take this offer before it shrinks further!
I'd rather take a bigger share now, even with inflation, than settle for less. 55-45 seems fair.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  I'm offering you a fair deal, and every round you wait, the value shrinks for you. Don't be stubborn!
